PAU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Senior Field Helper Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 10:53 IST
 Punjab Agricultural University
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Punjab |  Salary : 13,067 to 13,067




FOLLOW

Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Field Helper Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass and 12th can grab this chance and apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Punjab.

PAU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Field Helper 	02	10th Pass, 12th

Age Limit for the PAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 50 years.

Selection Process for the PAU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the PAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 13,067 /- per month.

Application fee for the PAU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Field Helper Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address given below.

Important Dates

Starting Date	25-08-2025
End Date	29-08-2025
